name: fReado
overview: fReado.com provides free, online book-marketing technology for book-authors that helps authors distribute their book-extract to over 60 social networks and bookmarking sites. The book-extract shows up in the form of a flip-book as a little widget on blogs, social networks and author sites. Visitors to the author’s page can preview the author’s book and discover additional buzz about the book such as links to videos, praise, media coverage and more. BookBuzzr is an engaging replacement for the static book-cover image that is found on most author websites and blogs. It’s the one book-marketing tool which every author needs to get their book discovered and shared on the Internet. Oh, and did I mention that it’s free?
